title: Project Bundle and Borders
body:
Hey Peoples,

I was wondering, If I brought the Project Alpha Set Bundle, would I get the loading screen borders as per the Project First strike?

Thanks Guys/Riot.
:D

replies.body: If you buy the bundle in the first week you will get the loading screen First Strike borders
What happens if you get them in mystery gifts?
I was wondering the same thing, but i bought it and got the borders
